alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Madison (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 3:22PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern East Carroll and western Madison Parishes, southeastern Washington, northwestern Issaquena and northwestern Sharkey Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 322 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hollandale to Tendal. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Tendal around 325 PM CDT. Grace around 400 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Mayersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
